name: TooltipRoot
description:
Groups all parts of the tooltip.
Doesnâ€™t render its own HTML element.

defaultOpen.description:
Whether the tooltip is initially open.

To render a controlled tooltip, use the `open` prop instead.

open.description: Whether the tooltip is currently open.

onOpenChange.type: ((open: boolean, event: Event | undefined, reason: "click" | "hover" | "focus" | "focus-out" | "escape-key" | "outside-press" | "trigger-press" | undefined) => void)
onOpenChange.description: Event handler called when the tooltip is opened or closed.

onOpenChangeComplete.description: Event handler called after any animations complete when the tooltip is opened or closed.

trackCursorAxis.description: Determines which axis the tooltip should track the cursor on.

delay.description: How long to wait before opening the tooltip. Specified in milliseconds.

closeDelay.description: How long to wait before closing the tooltip. Specified in milliseconds.

hoverable.description: Whether the tooltip contents can be hovered without closing the tooltip.
